Package counter.interfaces

Interface Summary
CounterInterface The interface the is implementing by the ServiceComponent in order to receives calls by the FrontendComponent for increasing the counter.
CounterResyncInterface The interface that ServiceComponent implements in order to receive calls by CounterStatusActuator component for resynchronizing its counter value.
CounterStatusInterface The interface used by ServiceComponent and implemented by CounterStatusSensor in order the 1st to inform the second about the change on the 1st's state (counter value).
SynchronizeInterface
